title: Change iMessage attachment retention
description: 71GB in ~/Library/Messages/Attachments. System Settings → Messages → Keep Messages → '1 Year' for ~50GB savings.

title: Set up cloud storage for CloudArchive
description: 11GB in ~/CloudArchive ready for cloud upload. Decide on Google Drive vs iCloud. Budget ~$10/mo for 2TB.

title: Verify conda/anaconda usage
description: 4.9GB in anaconda. Check if actively used with 'conda env list'. Remove if not needed.

title: Project: exa-helper - review uncommitted changes
description: exa-helper has 25+ uncommitted files. Review and either commit or clean up.
